titleStmt.title: A new ballad of bold Robin Hood: shewing his birth, breedings, valour and marriage, at Titbury Bull-running: calculated for the meridian of Staffordshire, but may serve for Derbyshire or Kent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for W.O. and are to be sold by the booksellers.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Kind gentlemen will you be patient a while ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
